sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.content: Cardbey is an AI-powered platform that automatically creates, operates, and scales businesses. This is a rare, time-limited opportunity to invest early in a pre-scale phase company before valuation multiples rise. The seed round is capped at AUD 3 million.

sections.title: The Idea
sections.content: Cardbey builds 24/7 AI-driven businesses that sell anywhere, anytime. Investors are not just funding a startup — they are owning a share of an AI machine that never sleeps.

sections.title: The Problem
sections.content: Millions of people dream of starting an online business but face major barriers: it’s too complex, too costly, and too slow. Small businesses lack digital know-how and struggle with marketing, sales, and logistics — especially in adopting AI to compete.

sections.title: The Solution: Cardbey
sections.content: Cardbey solves these challenges through four seamlessly integrated, AI-powered modules: Cardbey Platform (social commerce), C-Net Smart Display (AI ad & sales device), Smart Logistics (automated ordering & delivery), and AIcoin (future financial engine). Together they form a self-operating business ecosystem powered by AI.

sections.title: Market Opportunity
sections.content: The global markets for e-commerce, digital advertising, and logistics are worth trillions of dollars. Cardbey begins in Southeast Asia (Years 1–3) and expands globally thereafter. Large market + network effects = exponential growth potential.

sections.title: Business Model
sections.content: Revenue streams include premium software subscriptions, C-Net advertising fees, e-commerce transaction commissions, smart logistics margins, and credit/AIcoin circulation.

sections.title: Traction
sections.content: Core platform completed; C-Net Smart Displays deployed; packaging and fulfillment division launched; pilot programs active in Vietnam and Australia.

sections.title: Roadmap
sections.content: Years 1–3: Deploy platform in Vietnam and Australia, expand to Southeast Asia. Years 4–5: Scale globally and target IPO.

sections.title: Competitive Advantage
sections.content: Cardbey pioneers the convergence of social networks, e-commerce, and physical AI-powered ad & sales devices. Its AI brain enables scalable growth without proportional cost. Barriers: integrated hardware, software, and network.

sections.title: Case Studies (Investor Returns)
sections.content: Canva: $3M → $25B valuation. YouTube: $3.5M → $1.65B acquisition. Facebook: $500K → $100B IPO. Early investors in transformative tech earn outsized returns.

sections.title: Exit Strategy
sections.content: Exit options: IPO (within 5 years), strategic acquisition (Amazon, Alibaba, Meta), secondary share sales, and AIcoin as future liquidity vehicle.

sections.title: Investment Details
sections.content: Raising AUD 1–3 million seed round. Use of funds: deploy 1,000 C-Net displays, 500 Smart Warehouse (Nimi) devices, establish markets in Australia and Vietnam, expand logistics, and enhance AI ecosystem.

sections.title: Why Invest Now
sections.content: Seed round capped at AUD 3M. Early investors lock in AUD 18M valuation + 15% discount. Once filled, these terms will not repeat. Momentum is building with early commitments.

sections.title: Team
sections.content: Led by a proven founder/CEO with strong execution track record, supported by a passionate AI and technology team, and experts in logistics, commerce, and artificial intelligence.

sections.title: Appendix
sections.content: Includes SAFE investment template, market research data, and product visuals (C-Net Display, SmartBox, AIcoin infographics).
